Title: Using Version Control History to Follow the Changes of Source Code Elements
Published: 17th European Conference on Software Maintenance and Reengineering
Elements_risk_assessment: Didn't look the previous commit, only focus in the changes between versions to group them
Summary: They developed an algorithm, which is able to follow the changes of the source code elements by using the changes of files
Outcome: In this work we presented an algorithm which is able to extract  the  changes  from  version  control  systems  at  source code  element  level,
